summary:
Lydia now got baby-faced!
And you can marry with her.

Of course, Lydia still go wild action. That is Lydia, you know. LOL
descriptionHtml:
Baby-faced Lydia V1.0
By hitotch
=====================

=====================
Description
=====================
Lydia now got baby-faced!
And you can marry with her.

Of course, Lydia still go wild action. That is Lydia, you know. LOL

=====================
Features
=====================
- Baby-faced
- Marriage enabled

=====================
Recommended MODs with this MOD
=====================
- Nidias Face for CBBE
- RANs HeadMesh Variants Round face
- RANs Eyeliner Replacer
- Pretty Eyes

These MODs are on Nexus! EASY!
Feel free to use another face MODs.

=====================
Intallation
=====================
- Copy all files to Skyrim data folder.


=====================
Thank you very much, Skyrim team and MOD creaters!
author: hitotch
